import{io}from'socket.io-client';class SocketService{constructor(){this.socket=null;this.isConnected=false;this.currentRoom=null;this.isHost=false;this.listeners=new Map();}connect(token){if(this.socket&&this.isConnected){return Promise.resolve();}return new Promise((resolve,reject)=>{try{this.socket=io(process.env.REACT_APP_WEBSOCKET_URL||process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:5002',{auth:{token:token},transports:['websocket','polling']});this.socket.on('connect',()=>{console.log('âœ… Connected to WebSocket server');this.isConnected=true;resolve();});this.socket.on('disconnect',()=>{console.log('âŒ Disconnected from WebSocket server');this.isConnected=false;});this.socket.on('connect_error',error=>{console.error('âŒ WebSocket connection error:',error);reject(error);});this.socket.on('error',error=>{console.error('âŒ WebSocket error:',error);});// Set up room event listeners
this.setupRoomListeners();}catch(error){console.error('âŒ Failed to create socket connection:',error);reject(error);}});}setupRoomListeners(){if(!this.socket)return;// Playback synchronization events
this.socket.on('playback-state-sync',data=>{console.log('ðŸ”„ Received playback state sync:',data);this.emit('playback-state-sync',data);});this.socket.on('sync-play',data=>{console.log('â–¶ï¸ Received sync play:',data);this.emit('sync-play',data);});this.socket.on('sync-pause',data=>{console.log('â¸ï¸ Received sync pause:',data);this.emit('sync-pause',data);});this.socket.on('sync-seek',data=>{console.log('â© Received sync seek:',data);this.emit('sync-seek',data);});this.socket.on('sync-track-change',data=>{console.log('ðŸŽµ Received sync track change:',data);this.emit('sync-track-change',data);});this.socket.on('sync-volume-change',data=>{console.log('ðŸ”Š Received sync volume change:',data);this.emit('sync-volume-change',data);});// Room events
this.socket.on('user-joined',data=>{console.log('ðŸ‘‹ User joined room:',data);this.emit('user-joined',data);});this.socket.on('user-left',data=>{console.log('ðŸ‘‹ User left room:',data);this.emit('user-left',data);});}joinRoom(roomId){let isHost=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:false;if(!this.socket||!this.isConnected){console.error('âŒ Cannot join room: not connected to server');return;}this.currentRoom=roomId;this.isHost=isHost;console.log(`ðŸšª Joining room ${roomId} as ${isHost?'host':'participant'}`);this.socket.emit('join-room',roomId);}leaveRoom(){if(!this.socket||!this.currentRoom)return;console.log(`ðŸšª Leaving room ${this.currentRoom}`);this.socket.emit('leave-room');this.currentRoom=null;this.isHost=false;}// HOST ONLY: Control playback for entire room
hostPlay(trackId){let currentTime=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:0;if(!this.isHost||!this.socket||!this.currentRoom){console.warn('âš ï¸ Cannot control playback: not host or not in room');return;}console.log('â–¶ï¸ HOST: Triggering play for room',{trackId,currentTime});this.socket.emit('host-play',{trackId,currentTime});}hostPause(){let currentTime=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:0;if(!this.isHost||!this.socket||!this.currentRoom){console.warn('âš ï¸ Cannot control playback: not host or not in room');return;}console.log('â¸ï¸ HOST: Triggering pause for room',{currentTime});this.socket.emit('host-pause',{currentTime});}hostSeek(currentTime){if(!this.isHost||!this.socket||!this.currentRoom){console.warn('âš ï¸ Cannot control playback: not host or not in room');return;}console.log('â© HOST: Triggering seek for room',{currentTime});this.socket.emit('host-seek',{currentTime});}hostChangeTrack(trackId){let autoPlay=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:false;if(!this.isHost||!this.socket||!this.currentRoom){console.warn('âš ï¸ Cannot control playback: not host or not in room');return;}console.log('ðŸŽµ HOST: Triggering track change for room',{trackId,autoPlay});this.socket.emit('host-change-track',{trackId,autoPlay});}hostVolumeChange(volume){if(!this.isHost||!this.socket||!this.currentRoom){console.warn('âš ï¸ Cannot control playback: not host or not in room');return;}console.log('ðŸ”Š HOST: Triggering volume change for room',{volume});this.socket.emit('host-volume-change',{volume});}requestPlaybackSync(){if(!this.socket||!this.currentRoom)return;console.log('ðŸ”„ Requesting playback sync');this.socket.emit('request-playback-sync');}// Event listener management
on(event,callback){if(!this.listeners.has(event)){this.listeners.set(event,[]);}this.listeners.get(event).push(callback);}off(event,callback){if(!this.listeners.has(event))return;const callbacks=this.listeners.get(event);const index=callbacks.indexOf(callback);if(index>-1){callbacks.splice(index,1);}}emit(event,data){if(!this.listeners.has(event))return;this.listeners.get(event).forEach(callback=>{try{callback(data);}catch(error){console.error(`Error in socket event listener for ${event}:`,error);}});}disconnect(){if(this.socket){this.socket.disconnect();this.socket=null;this.isConnected=false;this.currentRoom=null;this.isHost=false;this.listeners.clear();}}// Getters
get connected(){return this.isConnected;}get roomId(){return this.currentRoom;}get hostStatus(){return this.isHost;}}// Export singleton instance
export default new SocketService();
